MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Solution GetIsolatedSolution() cil managed

Docs.summary:
Gets a copy of the solution isolated from the original so that they do not share computed state.
Use isolated solutions when doing operations that are likely to access a lot of text, syntax trees or compilations that are unlikely to be needed again after the operation is done. When the isolated solution is reclaimed so will the computed state.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance valuetype Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.VersionStamp GetLatestProjectVersion() cil managed

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Project GetProject(class Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.ProjectId projectId) cil managed

Gets the project in this solution with the specified project ID.
If the id is not an id of a project that is part of this solution the method returns null.
